column6: THE MORTAL IRON FIST PART 2 A mysterious force that has plagued the Immortal Iron Fists for centuries sets its sights on Danny Rand. Can Iron Fist stop the Ch'i-Lin?!
column8: | penciller:Travel Foreman | inker:Russ Heath | letterer:Dave Lanphear | colorist:Matt Milla | writer:Duane Swierczynski
